room_title: Escape room "Malcom's Missing Millions" by A Great Escape in Salt Lake City
room_description:
In this treasure hunt style adventure, you and your team are hot on the tracks of Malcom's missing fortune. As a lawyer, Malcom protected his corrupt clients for years. Frustrated with their misdeeds, Malcom decided to get back at them the only way he knew how. He would donate their millions to charity but not before keeping some for himself.

With his pursuers on his tail, Malcom was forced to flee, leaving only a few clues for his beloved Scarlet to find his location and missing treasure. Can you find the treasure in time? This is a challenging adventure sure to test your skills.
